name: Out of Control (MasiWasi)
description:
Level Up: Controls

ACTION! EXCITEMENT! MOVIE TRAILER WORDS!
Want to get closer to your friends? In this game pushing red buttons not only "level ups" your friends controls, but also their frustrations.
Fight like real ninja in this real life ninja simulator, with next gen textures from real life Japan, not that fake life Japan.

- Team ReusableStraws
